official_title: Culturally-targeted Communication to Promote SARS-CoV-2 Antibody Testing in Saliva: Enabling Evaluation of Inflammatory Pathways in COVID-19 Racial Disparities
inclusion_criteria:
* African American or White, 18 or older, and enrolled in the Flint Registry
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * All who do not meet inclusion criteria.
